aboutPage.title: About the Program
aboutPage.subtitle: Curriculum Matrix
aboutPage.paragraph1: The Internet Systems Technology (TSI) program at UTFPR ‚Äì Toledo Campus, launched in 2014, is a three-year (six-semester) undergraduate technology degree. It is completely tuition-free and has been officially recognized by the Brazilian Ministry of Education (MEC) since 2017.
aboutPage.paragraph2: Focused on the Information and Communication axis, the TSI program trains professionals capable of designing, implementing, and managing web systems, including interfaces, applications, electronic marketing, and intranets.
aboutPage.paragraph3: The curriculum, comprising approximately 2,400 hours, includes practical activities, supervised internship (360 hours), and a Final Course Project (TCC).
aboutPage.paragraph4: The program offers computer labs with dozens of workstations equipped for development, as well as support facilities such as physical and digital libraries, and individual and group study rooms. In 2023, the TSI program received a score of 4 (on a scale from 1 to 5) in the MEC evaluation, standing out for its didactic-pedagogical organization, qualified faculty (all holding master‚Äôs or doctoral degrees with significant scientific production), and high-quality infrastructure.

homePage.title: What is UTFPR?
homePage.paragraph1: The Federal University of Technology ‚Äì Paran√° (UTFPR) is a public higher education institution nationally recognized for its excellence in education, research, and technological innovation. Originally founded as the School of Apprentice Craftsmen in 1909, it underwent several transformations before becoming a technological university in 2005, the first in Brazil to receive this title.
homePage.paragraph2: Headquartered in Curitiba, UTFPR is present in several cities across the state of Paran√°, with 13 campuses distributed throughout the region. This broad regional presence contributes to local development by promoting access to high-quality higher education in various fields of knowledge, with a strong emphasis on engineering, exact sciences, and information technology.
homePage.paragraph3: The university offers undergraduate, master's, and doctoral programs, as well as extension initiatives and scientific research projects. Its educational model is focused on technical and technological training, emphasizing practical experience, innovation, and close ties with the productive sector. This approach makes UTFPR a benchmark in professional education aligned with the demands of the market and society.
homePage.paragraph4: In addition to academic excellence, UTFPR values inclusion, social responsibility, and sustainable development, promoting projects that benefit communities and encourage entrepreneurship. Its commitment to science and civic education contributes to the country‚Äôs technological advancement and to building a fairer and more innovative future.
